Name: Storm (Ultimate)
Description: Ororo Munroe was raised in Morocco, learning English from American films, and after her family was murdered she fled to America, stealing cars in Harlem before relocating to Texas.
FirstComicDescription: The First Appearance of Ultimate X-Men!  The world stands on the brink of genetic war. Mankind makes the first move, launching an army of giant, cybernetic executioners called Sentinels - programmed to target and eliminate mutants. The only force preventing total annihilation: the X-Men!
